title: Hidden costs of skin cancer caused by workplace sun exposure revealed

title_detail.value: Hidden costs of skin cancer caused by workplace sun exposure revealed

summary: Skin cancer cases attributable to work-related sun exposure could be costing millions of dollars, and must be better addressed by policymakers.

summary_detail.value: Skin cancer cases attributable to work-related sun exposure could be costing millions of dollars, and must be better addressed by policymakers.
